We create business and social platforms, and native apps.  Customer centric design with solid software engineering to back it.  Preferred technologies: Node.js, React/React Native, Mongo, Redis, SQL.

Growing a small business by removing technical barriers.  Rearchitecting systems and implementing development process, quality controls, and lifecycle automation.  Currently Dockerizing all the things.

Proposed and demonstrated full development lifecycle using container composition via Kubernetes.  Built reactive application with data streaming from Loopback to React.  Built a data generation utility that executes a declarative dependency graph with maximum concurrency.

Created full stack Node.js applications for clients.  Mentored employees on quality standards and customer interaction.  Created business and marketing strategy and promotional materials.  Created open source Node.js libraries for rapid prototyping and quality control.  Projects include: accounting project for government agency, platform for turnkey digital marketing campaigns, real-time chat system for ecommerce support.
Convrrt automates the process of landing page creation.  With no technical or marketing knowledge, you can use our prebuilt templates that are designed to work for your industry and purpose.
Studied electrical engineering, software algorithms, and operating systems.  Learned business communications skills, speech, and formal logic.

Desert Bloom Phoenix is an event series designed to bring together the music, art, and technology communities. With a focus on showcasing acts, technologists, and artists who have been overlooked or haven't found a receptive venue for their creative work, Desert Bloom encourages cross-pollination and co-operation between disparate creators and subcultures.

I lead a monthly workshop at the downtown Phoenix public library.  Our goal is to be a place for mentorship, growth, and feedback.  While many groups favor a lecture format, we instead break up into small groups for discussion, exercises, and projects.  The groups tend to be very interactive.  We have all skill levels, and are very fortunate to have generous people within the community that share their expertise with the groups.  Find out more here:http://www.meetup.com/Phoenix-JavaScript/events/

In addition, he gave us plenty of resources to continue our education further.  I would highly recommend Brandon and Torchlight Software for any needs you may have.
